intro: Euphrasia × eurycarpa, commonly known as the broad-fruited eyebright, is a hybrid plant species within the Scrophulariaceae family. It is characterized by its small, yellowish flowers and lance-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, open habitats such as meadows and woodlands. Its fruits are distinctive for their broad, fleshy structure, which aids in seed dispersal. Euphrasia × eurycarpa is often found in temperate regions of Europe and parts of Asia.
